title.rendered: Is That Junk Car Still Sitting in Your Driveway?

content.rendered:
“I was going to do something with that old junk car in the driveway, but never got around to it.” Do you find yourself saying this to visitors and family members when they ask about that hunk of junk collecting dust and rust out on your lawn? If you aren’t going to use the vehicle for anything, why not make some cash from it?
Even cars that don’t run can be worth something. When a vehicle stops working, it is usually due to one of the systems failing; the whole thing doesn’t just go out at once. Plenty of parts are likely still in fine working order. Many people purchase less expensive, used auto parts for replacement in their own vehicle or for a salvage project. Your trash can become someone else’s treasure, and you’ll even end up with money in your pocket!
Aero Auto Parts has been purchasing junk cars in the Chicago area since 1958. The best part? We will pick up the vehicle and remove it from your otherwise-beautiful property for you, so you don’t have to worry about transporting it on your own. The even better best part? We will give you cash on the spot! We pay the highest prices for junk cars in Chicago.
So what are you waiting for? Get the weight off your shoulders and the neighbors off your back by selling your junk car to Aero Auto Parts today! Call us at 773-483-2626 to schedule a pick up!
